withdrawn"}},"CompletePooledCreditLineRepaid(uint256,address,uint256)":{"params":{"id":"identifier for the pooled credit line","repayAmount":"amount repaid","repayer":"address of the repayer"}},"PooledCreditLineAccepted(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"total amount of tokens lent to pooled credit line","id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"PooledCreditLineCancelled(uint256,uint8)":{"params":{"id":"identifier for the pooled credit line","reason":"identifier which specifies the reason for which PCL was cancelled"}},"PooledCreditLineClosed(uint256)":{"params":{"id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"PooledCreditLineLiquidated(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"id":"identifier for the pooled credit line","shares":"amount of shares of collateral used for liquidation"}},"PooledCreditLineRequested(uint256,address,address)":{"params":{"borrower":"address of the borrower for credit protocolFeeCollector"}},"ProtocolFeeFractionUpdated(uint256)":{"params":{"updatedProtocolFee":"updated value of protocolFeeFraction"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"accept(uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"callback from lender pool contract","params":{"_amount":"Borrow Limit","_by":"user who accepted the PCL","_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"borrow(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"only borrower can call this function. Amount that can actually be borrowed is min(amount of borrow asset left in the pcl, amount that is borrowable based on ideal collateral ratio)","params":{"_amount":"amount of tokens to borrow","_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"calculateBorrowableAmount(uint256)":{"details":"is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view. borrowableAmount changes per block as interest changes per block.","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"amount that can be borrowed from the pooled credit line"}},"calculateCurrentCollateralRatio(uint256)":{"details":"is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view. Interest is also considered while calculating debt","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"collateral ratio multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR to retain precision"}},"calculateCurrentDebt(uint256)":{"details":"Used to calculate current debt of borrower against a pooled credit line.","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"current debt of borrower"}},"calculateInterestAccrued(uint256)":{"details":"Used to calculate the total interest accrued in the pcl since start till now","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"total interest accrued in the pcl since start till now"}},"calculateTotalCollateralTokens(uint256)":{"details":"is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"_amount total collateral tokens deposited into the pooled credit line"}},"cancelRequest(uint256)":{"details":"only callable by the borrower in REQUESTED state","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"cancelRequestOnLowCollection(uint256)":{"details":"only LenderPool can invoke","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"cancelRequestOnRequestedStateAtEnd(uint256)":{"details":"only LenderPool can invoke","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"close(uint256)":{"details":"this will also withdraw all the collateral and transfer it to the borrower","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"constructor":{"params":{"_lenderPool":"address of lenderPool contract","_limitsManager":"address of the _limitsManager contract","_maximumProtocolFeeFraction":"the maximum protocol fee fraction allowed","_priceOracle":"address of the priceOracle","_savingsAccount":"address of  the savings account contract","_strategyRegistry":"address of the strategy registry contract","_verification":"address of the verification contract"}},"depositCollateral(uint256,uint256,bool)":{"details":"collateral tokens have to be approved in savingsAccount or token contract","params":{"_amount":"amount of collateral being deposited","_fromSavingsAccount":"if true, tokens are transferred from savingsAccount otherwise direct from collateral token contract","_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"getBorrowerAddress(uint256)":{"params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"Returns borrower address for the given pooled credit line"}},"getEndsAt(uint256)":{"params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"Returns ends at time for the given pooled credit line"}},"getEquivalentCollateralTokens(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_borrowTokenAmount":"amount of borrow tokens for which equivalent collateral is calculated","_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"collateral tokens equivalent to _borrowTokenAmount"}},"getPrincipal(uint256)":{"params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"Returns principal for the given pooled credit line"}},"getStatusAndUpdate(uint256)":{"details":"keeps track of status of the PCL","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"status of pooled credit line"}},"initialize(address,uint256,address)":{"details":"can only be called once during the life cycle of the contract","params":{"_owner":"address of owner who can change global variables","_protocolFeeCollector":"address to which protocol fee is charged to","_protocolFeeFraction":"fraction of the fee charged by protocol (multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR)"}},"liquidate(uint256)":{"details":"this is a callback from the LenderPool.liquidate the collateral is directly transferred to lenderPool for lenders to withdraw","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"collateral asset received, amount of collateral asset received"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"repay(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"partial repayments possible","params":{"_amount":"amount being repaid","_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"request((uint256,uint256,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint128,uint128,address,address,address,address,address,bool))":{"params":{"_request":"Credit line creation request"},"returns":{"_0":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"terminate(uint256)":{"details":"only owner can invoke","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"updateProtocolFeeCollector(address)":{"details":"can only be updated by owner","params":{"_protocolFeeCollector":"address in which protocol fee is collected"}},"updateProtocolFeeFraction(uint256)":{"details":"can only be updated by owner","params":{"_protocolFeeFraction":"fraction of the borrower amount collected as protocol fee"}},"withdrawAllCollateral(uint256,bool)":{"details":"if the withdrawable collateral amount is non-zero the transaction will pass","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line","_toSavingsAccount":"if true, tokens are transferred from savingsAccount otherwise direct from collateral token contract"}},"withdrawCollateral(uint256,uint256,bool)":{"details":"collateral can't be withdraw if collateralRatio goes below the ideal value. Only borrower can withdraw","params":{"_amount":"amount of collateral to withdraw","_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line","_toSavingsAccount":"if true, tokens are transferred to savingsAccount, else to borrower address directly"}},"withdrawableCollateral(uint256)":{"details":"is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"total collateral withdrawable by borrower"}}},"stateVariables":{"depositedCollateralInShares":{"details":"id => collateralShares*"},"pooledCreditLineCounter":{"details":"used to create unique identifier for pooled credit lines*"},"protocolFeeFraction":{"details":"it is multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR*"}},"title":"Pooled Credit Line contract with Methods related to creditLines","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"BorrowedFromPooledCreditLine(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when tokens are borrowed from pooled credit line"},"CollateralSharesDeposited(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when a collateral is deposited into pooled credit line"},"CollateralSharesWithdrawn(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when collateral is withdrawn from pooled credit line"},"CompletePooledCreditLineRepaid(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when the pooled credit line is completely repaid"},"PartialPooledCreditLineRepaid(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when the pooled credit line is partially repaid"},"PooledCreditLineAccepted(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when pooled credit line is accepted"},"PooledCreditLineCancelled(uint256,uint8)":{"notice":"emitted when the pooled credit line is cancelled while in REQUESTED state"},"PooledCreditLineClosed(uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when the pooled credit line is closed by the borrower"},"PooledCreditLineLiquidated(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when a pooled credit line is liquidated"},"PooledCreditLineRequested(uint256,address,address)":{"notice":"emitted when a request for new pooled credit line is placed"},"PooledCreditLineTerminated(uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when the pooled credit line is terminated by owner"},"ProtocolFeeCollectorUpdated(address)":{"notice":"emitted when address which receives fee that protocol changes for pools is updated"},"ProtocolFeeFractionUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when fee that protocol charges for pooled credit line is updated"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"LENDER_POOL()":{"notice":"address of lender pool contract"},"LIMITS_MANAGER()":{"notice":"stores the address of limits manager*"},"MAXIMUM_PROTOCOL_FEE_FRACTION()":{"notice":"maximum protocol fee fraction allowed, it is multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR"},"PRICE_ORACLE()":{"notice":"stores the address of price oracle contract*"},"SAVINGS_ACCOUNT()":{"notice":"stores the address of savings account contract*"},"STRATEGY_REGISTRY()":{"notice":"stores the address of strategy registry contract*"},"VERIFICATION()":{"notice":"address that the borrower for pooled credit line should be verified with*"},"accept(uint256,uint256,address)":{"notice":"used to accept a pooled credit line"},"borrow(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"used to borrow tokens from credit line by borrower"},"calculateBorrowableAmount(uint256)":{"notice":"used to calculate amount that can be borrowed by the borrower"},"calculateCurrentCollateralRatio(uint256)":{"notice":"used to calculate the current collateral ratio"},"calculateTotalCollateralTokens(uint256)":{"notice":"used to calculate the total collateral tokens held in the pcl savings account"},"cancelRequest(uint256)":{"notice":"used to cancel a pooled credit line request. only callable by the borrower"},"cancelRequestOnLowCollection(uint256)":{"notice":"Function invoked when pooled credit line cancelled because of low collection"},"cancelRequestOnRequestedStateAtEnd(uint256)":{"notice":"Function invoked when pooled credit line cancelled because it wasn't started even after end time"},"close(uint256)":{"notice":"used to close pooled credit line. only callable by the borrower"},"constructor":{"notice":"constructor to initialize immutables"},"depositCollateral(uint256,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"used to deposit collateral into the pooled credit line"},"depositedCollateralInShares(uint256)":{"notice":"stores the collateral shares in a pooled credit line per collateral strategy"},"getBorrowerAddress(uint256)":{"notice":"used to get the borrower address in a pooled credit line"},"getEndsAt(uint256)":{"notice":"used to get the endAt time in a pooled credit line"},"getEquivalentCollateralTokens(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"used to calculate collateral tokens equivalent to _borrowTokenAmount"},"getPrincipal(uint256)":{"notice":"used to get the principal borrowed in a pooled credit line"},"getStatusAndUpdate(uint256)":{"notice":"used to update(if required) and get the status of pooled credit line"},"initialize(address,uint256,address)":{"notice":"used to initialize the contract"},"liquidate(uint256)":{"notice":"used to liquidate credit line in case collateral ratio goes below the threshold"},"pooledCreditLineConstants(uint256)":{"notice":"stores the constants related to a pooled credit line*"},"pooledCreditLineCounter()":{"notice":"counter that tracks the number of pooled credit lines created"},"pooledCreditLineVariables(uint256)":{"notice":"stores the variables to maintain a pooled credit line*"},"protocolFeeCollector()":{"notice":"address where protocol fee is collected*"},"protocolFeeFraction()":{"notice":"stores the fraction of borrowed amount charged as fee by protocol"},"repay(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"used to repay interest and principal to pooled credit line. Interest has to be repaid before repaying principal"},"request((uint256,uint256,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint128,uint128,address,address,address,address,address,bool))":{"notice":"used to request a pooled credit line by a borrower"},"terminate(uint256)":{"notice":"Function invoked when pooled credit line is terminated by admin"},"updateProtocolFeeCollector(address)":{"notice":"used to update the protocol fee collector"},"updateProtocolFeeFraction(uint256)":{"notice":"used to update the protocol fee fraction"},"withdrawAllCollateral(uint256,bool)":{"notice":"used to withdraw all the permissible collateral as per the current collateralRatio"},"withdrawCollateral(uint256,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"used to withdraw any excess collateral"},"withdrawableCollateral(uint256)":{"notice":"used to calculate the collateral that can be withdrawn"}},"notice":"Implements the functions related to Credit params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line

borrow(uint256,uint256).details: only borrower can call this function. Amount that can actually be borrowed is min(amount of borrow asset left in the pcl, amount that is borrowable based on ideal collateral ratio)

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line

calculateBorrowableAmount(uint256).details: is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view. borrowableAmount changes per block as interest changes per block.

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line

returns._0: amount that can be borrowed from the pooled credit line

calculateCurrentCollateralRatio(uint256).details: is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view. Interest is also considered while calculating debt

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line

returns._0: collateral ratio multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR to retain precision

calculateCurrentDebt(uint256).details: Used to calculate current debt of borrower against a pooled credit line.

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line

calculateInterestAccrued(uint256).details: Used to calculate the total interest accrued in the pcl since start till now

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line

returns._0: total interest accrued in the pcl since start till now

calculateTotalCollateralTokens(uint256).details: is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line

returns._0: _amount total collateral tokens deposited into the pooled credit line

cancelRequest(uint256).details: only callable by the borrower in REQUESTED state

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line
identifier for the pooled credit line
identifier for the pooled credit line

close(uint256).details: this will also withdraw all the collateral and transfer it to the borrower

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line

params._maximumProtocolFeeFraction: the maximum protocol fee fraction allowed
params._savingsAccount: address of  the savings account contract
params._strategyRegistry: address of the strategy registry contract

depositCollateral(uint256,uint256,bool).details: collateral tokens have to be approved in savingsAccount or token contract

params._fromSavingsAccount: if true, tokens are transferred from savingsAccount otherwise direct from collateral token contract
params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line
identifier for the pooled credit line

returns._0: Returns borrower address for the given pooled credit line

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line

returns._0: Returns ends at time for the given pooled credit line

params._borrowTokenAmount: amount of borrow tokens for which equivalent collateral is calculated
params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line
identifier for the pooled credit line

returns._0: Returns principal for the given pooled credit line

getStatusAndUpdate(uint256).details: keeps track of status of the PCL

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line

initialize(address,uint256,address).details: can only be called once during the life cycle of the contract

params._owner: address of owner who can change global variables
params._protocolFeeCollector: address to which protocol fee is charged to
params._protocolFeeFraction: fraction of the fee charged by protocol (multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR)

liquidate(uint256).details: this is a callback from the LenderPool.liquidate the collateral is directly transferred to lenderPool for lenders to withdraw

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line

returns._0: collateral asset received, amount of collateral asset received

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line

returns._0: identifier for the pooled credit line

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateProtocolFeeCollector(address).details: can only be updated by owner

params._protocolFeeCollector: address in which protocol fee is collected

updateProtocolFeeFraction(uint256).details: can only be updated by owner

params._protocolFeeFraction: fraction of the borrower amount collected as protocol fee

withdrawAllCollateral(uint256,bool).details: if the withdrawable collateral amount is non-zero the transaction will pass

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line
params._toSavingsAccount: if true, tokens are transferred from savingsAccount otherwise direct from collateral token contract

withdrawCollateral(uint256,uint256,bool).details: collateral can't be withdraw if collateralRatio goes below the ideal value. Only borrower can withdraw

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line
params._toSavingsAccount: if true, tokens are transferred to savingsAccount, else to borrower address directly

withdrawableCollateral(uint256).details: is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line

LIMITS_MANAGER().notice: stores the address of limits manager*

MAXIMUM_PROTOCOL_FEE_FRACTION().notice: maximum protocol fee fraction allowed, it is multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR

PRICE_ORACLE().notice: stores the address of price oracle contract*

SAVINGS_ACCOUNT().notice: stores the address of savings account contract*

STRATEGY_REGISTRY().notice: stores the address of strategy registry contract*

VERIFICATION().notice: address that the borrower for pooled credit line should be verified with*

accept(uint256,uint256,address).notice: used to accept a pooled credit line

borrow(uint256,uint256).notice: used to borrow tokens from credit line by borrower

calculateBorrowableAmount(uint256).notice: used to calculate amount that can be borrowed by the borrower

calculateCurrentCollateralRatio(uint256).notice: used to calculate the current collateral ratio

calculateTotalCollateralTokens(uint256).notice: used to calculate the total collateral tokens held in the pcl savings account

cancelRequest(uint256).notice: used to cancel a pooled credit line request. only callable by the borrower

cancelRequestOnLowCollection(uint256).notice: Function invoked when pooled credit line cancelled because of low collection

cancelRequestOnRequestedStateAtEnd(uint2.notice: Function invoked when pooled credit line cancelled because it wasn't started even after end time

close(uint256).notice: used to close pooled credit line. only callable by the borrower

depositCollateral(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: used to deposit collateral into the pooled credit line

depositedCollateralInShares(uint256).notice: stores the collateral shares in a pooled credit line per collateral strategy

getBorrowerAddress(uint256).notice: used to get the borrower address in a pooled credit line

getEndsAt(uint256).notice: used to get the endAt time in a pooled credit line

getEquivalentCollateralTokens(uint256,ui.notice: used to calculate collateral tokens equivalent to _borrowTokenAmount

getPrincipal(uint256).notice: used to get the principal borrowed in a pooled credit line

getStatusAndUpdate(uint256).notice: used to update(if required) and get the status of pooled credit line

liquidate(uint256).notice: used to liquidate credit line in case collateral ratio goes below the threshold

pooledCreditLineConstants(uint256).notice: stores the constants related to a pooled credit line*

pooledCreditLineCounter().notice: counter that tracks the number of pooled credit lines created

pooledCreditLineVariables(uint256).notice: stores the variables to maintain a pooled credit line*

protocolFeeCollector().notice: address where protocol fee is collected*

protocolFeeFraction().notice: stores the fraction of borrowed amount charged as fee by protocol

repay(uint256,uint256).notice: used to repay interest and principal to pooled credit line. Interest has to be repaid before repaying principal

request((uint256,uint256,address,uint256.notice: used to request a pooled credit line by a borrower

terminate(uint256).notice: Function invoked when pooled credit line is terminated by admin

updateProtocolFeeCollector(address).notice: used to update the protocol fee collector

updateProtocolFeeFraction(uint256).notice: used to update the protocol fee fraction

withdrawAllCollateral(uint256,bool).notice: used to withdraw all the permissible collateral as per the current collateralRatio

withdrawCollateral(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: used to withdraw any excess collateral

withdrawableCollateral(uint256).notice: used to calculate the collateral that can be withdrawn
